title: Service Request Management Procedure (PIT-S130-0103) | Yönerge
text: Procedure No PIT-S130-0103V14 Effective Date 13-01-2012 Update Date 13-03-2025 Related Unit / Owner IT / Bilgi Teknolojileri Direktörü Approved by BT / Board of Trustees Related Instruction Bilgi Teknolojileri İşlerini Yönetme Yönergesi (IIT-S130-01) Aim To provide services in the service catalog to users. Scope This procedure covers the services in the service catalog provided by the Information Technology (IT) Unit and their provision to users. Definitions / Abbreviations IT: Information Technologies SU: Sabanc ı University ÇTU: Call recording/tracking application Implementation Steps Responsibili ty Outputs/Timing 1. Recording of Requests 1.1. University users submit service requests as specified in the Support Services Management Instruction Letter (IIT-S140-01). SU Users 1.2. Incoming requests are recorded in the ÇTU system as the & quot;Incident :: ServiceRequest&quot ; type. IT Help Desk Request Record / Immediately 1.3 .The recorded call is sent to the relevant service manager for evaluation/resolution. This transfer also assigns the responsible person. IT Help Desk Request Record / Immediately 2. Review of Requests 2.1. User requests are resolved within two business days by the service manager in the service catalog. IT Help Desk ÇTU / 2 business days 2.2. If the service request is not included in the IT service catalog, the request is handled in accordance with the IT Resources Planning Instruction Letter (IIT-S110-01). IT Help Desk 2.3. In both cases, the user is notified. IT Help Desk email / After the work is done Related Forms Service Catalog (FIT-S13001-06) (for internal use only) Related Form Links
